raw_text:
SALES ASSOCIATE       Summary    Actively seeking a Full Time position in Technology within an organization utilizing my skillset and innovation to grow in a success driven atmosphere.      Highlights        Win10, 8, 7, Vista, XP, Server 2013, ipad, tablets
Hardware: PC Setup/Configuration/Integration/ Printers, Monitors, Routers, Scanners, Cables
Software:  IE 10,9,MS Suite, Adobe Reader, Firefox, Mozilla, Wi-Fi              Experience      Sales Associate     Nov 2011   to   Current      Company Name   －   City  ,   State     Interact and assist customers, co-workers, Loss Prevention and Management, take direction from supervisor on assigned tasks and notify upon completion, notify Loss Prevention of suspicious activity and safety hazards, answer phone, provide customer service on sales floor while assisting with recovery.         Materials Handler     Jun 2008   to   Mar 2009      Company Name   －   City  ,   State     Extract parts from inventory for kits to be assembled on production floor, audits, notify supervisor of completed tasks, data entry, technical support.         Mailroom Clerk     Oct 2007   to   Feb 2008      Company Name   －   City  ,   State     Process incoming/outgoing mail via electronic processor, distribute interoffice  mail, retrieve files for underwriter department, follow up with supervisor with updates on progress, faxing, copying,.         Warehouse Clerk     Dec 2006   to   Oct 2007      Company Name   －   City  ,   State     Assist shipping manager prepare outgoing orders, assist supervisor verify incoming supplies from receiving dock and replenish back into inventory, record new inventory counts and follow up with supervisor to keep records accurate, replenish supplies to production floor for assembly, place supply orders via purchasing manager, distribute interoffice mail.         Education      AS  ,   Network Engineering   2017     Moorpark College         Network Engineering       AS  ,   Computer Information Systems   2007     Moorpark College         Computer Information Systems            1994     Simi Valley High School Graduate                Skills    Adobe, Cables, Hardware, copying, customer service, data entry, direction, faxing, IE, inventory, Loss Prevention, mail, Win, Monitors, PC Setup, Printers, progress, purchasing, receiving, Routers, safety, sales, Scanners, shipping, supervisor, technical support, phone, underwriter, Vista
story:
Let me transform this resume into a career story:

Meet a technology enthusiast who's been on quite the professional journey. After graduating from Simi Valley High School in 1994, they pursued their passion for technology at Moorpark College, earning an AS in Computer Information Systems in 2007, and later returning to complete another AS in Network Engineering in 2017.

Their career began in a warehouse in December 2006, where they learned the ins and outs of inventory management and shipping operations. They worked closely with shipping managers, handled supply orders, and kept meticulous inventory records. This experience led to a brief stint as a Mailroom Clerk in late 2007, where they managed both electronic and physical mail processing, while supporting the underwriter department.

By mid-2008, they had moved into a Materials Handler position, where they got hands-on experience with production floor operations and provided technical support. But it was in November 2011 when they found their true calling in retail technology sales, a position they continue to hold today. As a Sales Associate, they've become an expert at combining their technical knowledge with customer service skills, helping customers navigate various technology products while also supporting loss prevention efforts and maintaining store operations.

Throughout their career, they've developed an impressive technical toolkit, becoming proficient with various Windows operating systems (from XP to Windows 10), hardware configuration, and essential software applications. They're particularly skilled at setting up and troubleshooting PCs, printers, monitors, routers, and scanners.

Now, they're looking to take their next career step, seeking a full-time position in technology where they can apply their diverse skill set and innovative thinking in a success-driven environment. Their unique combination of technical expertise and customer service experience makes them well-equipped to tackle new challenges in the technology sector.
